entry.title: what's in a name?
entry.summary:
Author: icantcountthereasonsishouldstay

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,889Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 4

Summary: Clark has waited his whole life for his soulmate's name, wondering if he'll even have one. But when a nonsensical phrase appears on his wrist, he's devastated. What on earth is Batman? Later, he meets the charismatic and vapid Bruce Wayne. But Clark soon realizes there's more to Bruce than meets the eye, and he starts falling for the gorgeous millionaire, all but forgetting his soulmate. When he does meet his supposed soulmate, Batman is cold and aloof, leaving Clark more confused than ever. Why is he falling so hard for a man who isn't his soulmate? And why hasn't his actual soulmate said anything to him? Clark thinks Batman hates him, but that couldn't be further from the truth. Bruce isn't concerned with soulmates. Nothing matters except his mission. He barely cares when the name appears. But when he discovers a connection between his soulmate and the mysterious new meta the news is calling Superman, he decides to do some digging, starting with Clark Kent. He invites him to one of the Wayne Galas, and he's immediately struck by how gorgeous Clark is. As he and Clark get closer, Bruce starts to feel guilty. Clark can never know that they're soulmates or his secret identity. That still doesn't stop him from wanting more.

entry.title: When Darkness Meets the Light
entry.summary:
Author: YairPL

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,478Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 14

Summary: One year after donning the cowl, Bruce Wayne is no hero. Batman is a specter of vengeance and fury, an unstable project channeling the trauma of a child still screaming in an alleyway. His mission is a self-destructive obsession, and Gotham, a black hole deserving to be purged with fire. Clark Kent, on the other hand, bears the weight of a power he believes he owes to the universe. His invincibility is not a gift, but a shield that must stand before all the pain of others, a cosmic guilt that drives him to save even those who do not want to be saved. When the Daily Planet reporter is assigned to cover Bruce Wayne's charity gala, a clash of ideologies tears away both their masks. Clark sees the deep open wound behind the playboy. Bruce feels for the first time truly seen. This is the story of how light does not always blind the darkness; sometimes, it sits beside it in silence and offers to heal its wounds. It is the journey of two men meeting at the precipice: one learning to be a hero, and the other learning to be human. And from the fragile bridge of understanding they build, the legend will be born.

entry.title: We Could Be Heroes - A SuperBat Love Story
entry.summary:
Author: xxEmilee_Lunaxx

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 115,420Chapters: 40/?Kudos: 360

Summary: "I‚Äôve made a lot of mistakes in my life, and for a long time, I thought I‚Äôd continue to fall into darkness. But Clark is like a shining light. He inspires me to be a better person.‚Äù Bruce Wayne and Clark Kent both maintain a strong sense of justice and fight for peace in their respective cities. However, both are struggling to maintain order alone, and are weighed down by a lost sense of identity and the loneliness that stems from the isolation of living a double life. After a chance encounter, the pair agree to form a Justice League to address the growing threat to Earth's security. As they learn to work together, new feelings blossom, and the heroes soon find themselves leaning on each other for support and comfort. Slow-burn romance. Bat-family drama. Justice League shenanigans. Bruce being a rich kid with issues. Superman being an innocent lad. Your favorite black cat/golden retriever boys are in for a wild ride.

entry.title: Dark Days and Lost Suns
entry.summary:
Author: Athena_Faymont

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 104,243Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 96

Summary: Clark admires Batman, the man who has given up civilian life to protect everyone else's, the tough, sharp, and compassionate man. Bruce admires Superman, the alien who, despite being able to dominate them all by force, has decided to take care of a planet that isn't his own.And, even with these two flawed principles, neither of them can imagine how alone the other feels... and how alone they themselves are. This is a long story, the superbat fanfic I've always wanted to write about how, within the canon, one day something changes and they find each other. If you want to join me on this adventure, we'll be here every Friday. [Puedes encontrarlo en espa√±ol en mi perfil.]
